_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: NodeJS [1.1.40]
author: contact@inetol.net
description: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform, back-end JavaScript runtime environment that runs on the V8 engine and executes JavaScript code outside a web browser.
startup: clear && if [ {{DEBUG}} == 1 ]; then bash; fi; if [ {{AUTOUPIN}} == 1 ]; then if [ {{MODE}} == 0 ]; then npm install --production; fi; if [ {{MODE}} == 1 ]; then if [ {{YARNV}} == 2 ]; then yarn set version berry; fi; yarn install; fi; fi; if [ "{{ENVAR1}}" != "" ]; then export {{ENVAR1}}; fi; if [ "{{ENVAR2}}" != "" ]; then export {{ENVAR2}}; fi; if [ "{{ENVAR3}}" != "" ]; then export {{ENVAR3}}; fi; if [ "{{ENVAR4}}" != "" ]; then export {{ENVAR4}}; fi; if [ "{{ENVAR5}}" != "" ]; then export {{ENVAR5}}; fi; if [ {{MODE}} == 0 ]; then node {{FLAGS}} {{FILE}}; elif [ {{MODE}} == 1 ]; then if [ {{YARNV}} == 2 ]; then yarn set version berry; elif [ {{YARNV}} == 1 ]; then yarn set version latest; fi; yarn node {{FLAGS}} {{FILE}}; fi;

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
apt-get update && apt-get upgrade -y && apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y git node-gyp curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool build-essential glibc; apt autoremove -y; apt autoclean; apt clean; clear
echo -e "NodeJS DockerSlot V1.1.40 | EdgeStack"
exit 0

variables.name: Use YARN?
variables.description: Use YARN instead of NPM. It's strongly recommended to leave this as default if you don't know what are you doing.

variables.name: YARN version
variables.description: If YARN is enabled, you need to specify which version is used. Recomended using the version "2".

variables.name: Auto [Update / Install] Packages
variables.description: Allow NPM or YARN installing or updating the packages when starting the slot.

variables.name: Environment variable 1
variables.description: Saves a variable in the slot for later use when running the project. It's strongly recommended to leave this blank if you don't know what are you doing. (ex: "TOKEN=AABBCCDD123" or "SECRET=295279283994230786")
